about_the_game:
Game background

In the 26th century BC, Chiyou launched a campaign against the Yellow Emperor, gathering the elite soldiers of the tribe and all kinds of ferocious beasts. In addition, Fengbo Yushi was invited to help. After nine victories in the ninth battle, the Yellow Emperor retreated to the city and turned to the Ninth Heaven Xuannv, the Xuannv Zhaoxia, and all the friars came to help. The player will play the role of commander and make reasonable use of the extraordinary ability of all friars to defeat the Chiyou army.

Main game content

After the game starts, players will get gold coins as time goes by. The gold coins can hire friars to join the battle at the bottom of the game. If you are not satisfied with the existing characters, you can choose to refresh or upgrade to hire more high-quality characters.

The ability attributes and battlefield positioning of each character are different. Players can have enough gold coins to allow the corresponding character to join the battle at the required time through operation. At the same time, they can adjust the initial position of the character through the mouse.

Players need to resist a total of 10 waves of attack to win the game, which can be understood as 10 levels. The difficulty of the next wave will increase accordingly, and the monsters will also be different. BOSS will participate in the fifth and tenth waves.
detailed_description:
About developers

The game is developed for individuals. Please understand the many imperfections.


About the Game

Game background

In the 26th century BC, Chiyou launched a campaign against the Yellow Emperor, gathering the elite soldiers of the tribe and all kinds of ferocious beasts. In addition, Fengbo Yushi was invited to help. After nine victories in the ninth battle, the Yellow Emperor retreated to the city and turned to the Ninth Heaven Xuannv, the Xuannv Zhaoxia, and all the friars came to help. The player will play the role of commander and make reasonable use of the extraordinary ability of all friars to defeat the Chiyou army.

Main game content

After the game starts, players will get gold coins as time goes by. The gold coins can hire friars to join the battle at the bottom of the game. If you are not satisfied with the existing characters, you can choose to refresh or upgrade to hire more high-quality characters.

The ability attributes and battlefield positioning of each character are different. Players can have enough gold coins to allow the corresponding character to join the battle at the required time through operation. At the same time, they can adjust the initial position of the character through the mouse.

Players need to resist a total of 10 waves of attack to win the game, which can be understood as 10 levels. The difficulty of the next wave will increase accordingly, and the monsters will also be different. BOSS will participate in the fifth and tenth waves.
name: Enemy at the Gates:Commander

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: 64-bit Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-4430 / AMD FX-6300
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 960 2GB / AMD Radeon R7 370 2GB
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 5 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: update the graphics card driver to the latest
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: 64-bit Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-6600K / AMD Ryzen 5 1600
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1060 3GB / AMD Radeon RX 580 4GB
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 5 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: update the graphics card driver to the latest

short_description: Commander is a war strategy tower defense game. You will play the role of a commander, constantly recruit soldiers to improve the defensive strength, match the appropriate lineup, and finally defeat the enemy.
